column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Jeremia kaa ɔman no nyina hɔn EWURADZE Nyankopɔn ne nsɛm a hɔn EWURADZE Nyankopɔn dze somaa no hɔn nkyɛn no nyina wiei no
column7: na ahopɔwfo no nyina kasaa kyerɛɛ Jeremia
column9: Eka atorsɛm: EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn no ɔnnsomaa wo dɛ bɛse dɛ
column10: Mma hom nnkɔ Egypt nnkɛyɛ amamforafo wɔ hɔ;"

column2: "na Neria ba Baruk na opiapia wo tsia hɛn
column3: ma oeyi hɛn ahyɛ Kaldeafo nsa
column5: na wɔaasoa hɛn ndɔmmum akɔ Babilɔn."

column3: na dɔm no mu asafohemfo no nyina
column5: woenntsie EWURADZE ne ndze dɛ wɔbɛtsena Juda asaase do."

column3: na dɔm no mu asafohen no nyina wɔfaa Juda nkaase nyina a wɔasan efi amanaman a wɔpaam hɔn kɔr hɔ nyina mu abɛyɛ amamforafo wɔ Juda;"

column6: na nyimpa biara a aweɔmfo safohen Nebuzaradan daan no gyaa Safan ba Ahikam ne ba Gedalia ne nkyɛn no

column2: "na wɔbaa Egypt asaase do; na woenntsie EWURADZE ne ndze: na wɔbaa Tapanhes mpo."
"Nna EWURADZE n’asɛm baa Jeremia nkyɛn wɔ Tapanhes
column6: na fa hyehyɛ ntaayaa nsɛwee a ɔwɔ Farao fie abowano wɔ Tapanhes no mu

column4: Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi: Hwɛ
column5: mobɔsoma akɛfa Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar m’akowaa no
column6: na medze n’akɔngua esi abo a medze ahyehyɛ ha yi do; na ɔaheran n’akatamanso do wɔ do."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba abɔbɔ Egypt asaase; hɔn a wɔsɛ owu no
column4: na hɔn a wɔsɛ ndɔmmum kɔ no
column6: na hɔn a wɔsɛ afona no

column2: "Na mobɔsɔ gya wɔ Egypt abosom efi mu
column4: na ɔasoa hɔn akɔ ndɔmmum: na ɔdze Egypt asaase bofura dɛ mbrɛ oguanhwɛfo dze n’atar hyɛ; na ofi hɔ befir edzi asomdwee mu."

column2: "Obobu Bɛt-semes a ɔwɔ Egypt asaase do no n’edum no; na ɔdze gya ahyew Egypt abosom efi no nyina."
